title: API Framework
extract: Framework. A framework, or software framework, is a platform for developing software applications. It provides a foundation on which software developers can build programs for a specific platform. ... A framework is similar to an application programming interface (API), though technically a framework includes an API.Mar 7, 2013
extract_html: Framework. A framework, or software framework, is a platform for developing software applications. It provides a foundation on which software developers can build programs for a specific platform. ... A framework is similar to an application programming interface (API), though technically a framework includes an API.Mar 7, 2013
